import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; export default class AdminUpdate extends React.Component{ state={ newTitle:'', newDesigner:'', newPrice:'', newDescription:'', newCategoryID:'', newColor:'', newImg:'', sale:'', saleDiscount:'' } //sale should be set to false and then we change or empty? handleChange=e=>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } updateProduct=()=>{ let url = 'http://localhost:3001/products/admin/products/update' let { newTitle, newDesigner, newPrice, newDescription, newCategoryID, newColor, newImg}=this.state try{ axios.post(url, {id:this.props.match.params.id, newTitle:newTitle,newDesigner:newDesigner, price:newPrice, description:newDescription, categoryID:newCategoryID, color:newColor, img: newImg}) } catch(error){ debugger } } render(){ let { newTitle, newDesigner, newPrice, newDescription, newCategory, newColor, newImg}=this.state return(

Update a Product

) } } const decor={ big:{ width: '70%', margin: 'auto' }, border:{ borderBottom: '2px solid rgb(42, 43, 45)' }, grid:{ display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: '1fr 1fr' }, label:{ marginTop: '1em', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'left', clear: 'left', fontSize: '23px', fontFamily:"'EB Garamond', serif", }, select:{ width:'400px', border: '1px solid #cbcbcb', height: '24px', outline: 'none', background: 'white', borderTop:'none', borderRight:'none', borderLeft: 'none', fontFamily:"'EB Garamond', serif", }, input:{ width:'360px', outline: 'none', borderTop:'none', borderRight:'none', borderLeft: 'none', fontFamily:"'EB Garamond', serif" }, button:{ marginTop: '2em', marginBotton: '2em', width: '200px', height:'24px', display: 'flex', float: 'left', fontFamily:"'EB Garamond', serif", outline: 'none' } }
